about_the_game:
About the game


Caved-in is a short and sweet Metroidvania about a little robot who was found by a group of misfit adventurers. After being rebooted Cobalt the robot embarks on a perilous journey to find the rare Celestial Lotus, getting help from cute and funny NPCs and being delayed by challenging bosses and difficult enemies.

Explore!

Explore a vast, colorful, and open world consisting of over 8 biomes all with more than 9 interconnected rooms in each!


Abilities!

Explore and find more than 7 different abilities and weapon upgrades spanning across the world!


Dialogue and NPCs!

Talk to over 13 different NPCs spanning across the entire world, all having funny and interesting dialogues.


Features

  • Large interconnected world.
  • Retro aesthetics with a modern 2D side scroller feel.
  • Tight and weighty feeling player controls.
  • Funny and cute NPCs.
  • Choosable dialogue with different outcomes.
  • 8 Custom bosses unique to their respective biomes.
  • Tons of different upgrades to your robot.
  • Lots of upgrades to your weapon arsenal.
  • Steam Achievments.

short_description: Caved-in is a crazy, cute, and colorful 2D Metroidvania set in a world full of exploration and combat. Interact with cute and funny NPCs and battle intimidating and challenging bosses that will help you in your effort to find the rare Celestial Lotus!
